rrdworld.name: collectd
rrdworld.author: Florian Forster
rrdworld.description: collectd is a lightweight daemon that periodically collects system information. Since it's kept in memory the intervals can be very short without being hard on the system. Currently Linux 2.4/2.6 and Solaris 5.9 have been tested to work, other UNIXes may work through an external library.
